Create a fake base of tickets

Source: R/fake_client.R
fake_base_clients.Rd

A fake base of customer support tickets

fake_base_clients(n, local = c("en_US", "fr_FR"), seed = 2811)

Arguments

n

the number of clients
local

the local of the base. Currently supported : "fr_FR" and "en_US".
seed

the random seed, default is 2811

Examples

fake_base_clients(n = 10)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 14
#>    num_client first last  job     age region id_dpt departement cb_provider
#>  * <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl> <chr>  <chr>  <chr>       <chr>      
#>  1 1          Laney Adams Inve…    85 Rhône… 26     Drôme       JCB 16 dig…
#>  2 2          Dr.   Tala… Auto…    18 <NA>   93     Seine-Sain… Voyager    
#>  3 3          Carl… Cass… Ward…    83 Lorra… 55     Meuse       Voyager    
#>  4 4          Jadi… Fees… Engi…    42 Bourg… 21     <NA>        JCB 16 dig…
#>  5 5          Ophe… Wint… Purc…    30 Poito… 86     Vienne      Diners Clu…
#>  6 6          Sier… Hett… Tran…    NA Lorra… 54     Meurthe-et… JCB 16 dig…
#>  7 7          Sydn… Nitz… <NA>     50 Aquit… 33     Gironde     American E…
#>  8 8          Cade  Turc… Prod…    43 Bourg… 58     Nièvre      <NA>       
#>  9 9          Leer… Beat… Food…    40 <NA>   64     Pyrénées-A… Discover
